A one-off incident can be classed as harassment if it's serious enough. Harassment can happen both inside and outside the workplace, for example on a business trip or at a work social function e.g. Christmas party. EPAM employees need to remember that everyone's different and something that doesn't offend you might offend someone else and vice versa. Just because something doesn't or wouldn't offend you, doesn't mean that it's appropriate behavior. If you're in any doubt about whether something is appropriate or not, don't do it. Some examples of bullying are:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Verbal - constantly shouting or humiliating someone, picking on someone or conduct that attacks someone's character or reputation, ridicules, humiliates or consistently undermines them\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Physical - conduct which is intimidating, or threatening, physically abusive behavior\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Non-verbal – looks or gestures, sending malicious e-mails or texts\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"*The above are just examples and are not a full list.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Legitimate, constructive and fair criticism of an employee's performance or behavior at work is not bullying. An occasional raised voice or argument, or using a strong management style is not bullying, provided that everyone is treated with respect and dignity. But we don't condone bullying under the guise of 'strong management'.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"What are my responsibilities as an EPAM employee?\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We all have a responsibility to make sure that our working environment is as positive as possible and is therefore free from harassment, bullying or discrimination.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Everyone should be treated with respect and dignity and in the same way that we ourselves would expect to be treated. You should avoid any behavior which could be seen as harassment and/or bullying.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you are found to have harassed or bullied anyone whilst working here (whether that person is an employee, contractor, agency worker or third party), you could be disciplined, and this may result in your dismissal.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"What are a manager's responsibilities?\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Managers have a responsibility to try and make sure that no harassment or bullying occurs in the areas they look after.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Managers should also be responsive and supportive of anyone who makes a complaint about harassment either informally or formally and provide clear advice on the process. Managers are also responsible for trying to ensure that there are no further instances of harassment, bullying or victimization once a complaint has been resolved.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"When a complaint of harassment or bullying is made, managers should contact the HR as soon as possible for guidance on how to proceed.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"How EPAM Employee can make a complaint?\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You can approach HR for support and advice on dealing with the situation at any time. EPAM takes complaints seriously and, wherever possible, will maintain employee's anonymity. Any written complaint will be dealt with under the Grievance policy. In order to help EPAM help you and to investigate your complaint, please provide as much detail as possible about your complaint, including specific events, dates and times where you can.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you wish to handle the complaint informally, you should make it clear to the individual(s) concerned that the conduct or behavior is unwelcome and should stop. You can make a note of this for your own records if you wish. Alternatively, you could ask a colleague to approach the harasser on your behalf. If the conduct or behavior is not resolved, then you should consider taking the matter up formally through the grievance policy.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Occasionally, once an investigation has taken place it may be decided that a malicious and/or false complaint has been made. Any individual found to have made such a complaint may be subject to disciplinary action.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Is there any other employee support available?\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"At any time, if you feel upset as a result of another person's behavior or conduct you should approach your manager in the first instance or HR who will act impartially to provide confidential support and advice.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You may also find it helpful to speak with a close friend or colleague about the problem. You should be aware that because the helpline service is confidential, we would not know about your concerns. You should raise these internally as well if you want us to investigate. Remember, we can't help you if we don't know.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Need more information?\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you need further advice, contact your manager or your HR.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
